abstract: North Korea sentences Kim Guk-gi and Choe Chun-gil, to life sentence of hard labor, accusing them of spying for South Korea.
lead_paragraph: The North accused the two men of trying to undermine its government on behalf of South Korea and the United States.

headline.main: North Korea Gives Life Sentences to ‘Bourgeois’ Spies From South
headline.print_headline: North Korea Gives Life Sentences to ‘Bourgeois’ Spies From South

snippet: The North accused the two men of trying to undermine its government on behalf of South Korea and the United States.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
